oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Miss Sallie Gibson
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Gibson, Sallie; African Americans; women; portraits;
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Photograph in paper frame. -- Text on front: Miss Sallie Gibson -- Text on back: Come to me, Sweet Marie! -- Not because your face is fair, love, to see, -- But because your soul so pure & sweet -- makes my happiness complete, -- making me linger at your feet, Sweet Marie.
oai_dc:dc.dc:format: black & white photo on metal, 2.5 in. x 3.75 in.
